title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Nested Scaffolding Design for Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts at the Secondary School Level
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their ability to solve complex mathematical problems step-by-step using nested scaffolding strategies.
Learners can create and implement self-directed learning plans using LMS and smartphone-based tools.
Learners can continuously monitor and improve learning outcomes through formative assessments (quizzes, practice tasks, integrated tasks).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
